A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The ending felt like they just threw something together because they had to do it. It didn't seem to wrap up the movie well nor set it up for Episode IX. The lack of backstory about the First Order and Rey's parents that we all thought we would get\, we didn't. Still\, it was the spectacle that we were hoping for\, just a few pieces weren't up to par. Hence\, 4 out of 5 stars.
